segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is really stretching to reach those cookies, he looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's making me really nervous just looking at it, I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like nothing is wrong, she looks so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't turned around yet to see what they're doing, she's just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, creating such a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids have done this before, taking cookies when she's not looking, they seem so used to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is already full of cookies, he must really have a sweet tooth, I hope he saves some for his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and catches them in the act, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just filled with so much tension, it's like a time bomb waiting to go off, I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
